result.markdown:
---
title: "Experiment 3"
format: html
---

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(targets)
tar_source()
tar_load(c(exp3_data_agg))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
est <- estimate_model(
  start = paper_params(),
  data = exp3_data_agg,
  two_step = TRUE,
  exclude_sp1 = TRUE,
  simplify = TRUE,
  prior = list(
    gain = list(mean = 25, sd = 1)
  )
)

est
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 1 Ã— 8
   prop prop_ltm    rate   tau  gain deviance convergence fit       
  <dbl>    <dbl>   <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>    <dbl>       <int> <list>    
1 0.203    0.811 0.00951 0.132  25.0     766.           0 <srl_rcl_>
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
exp3_data_agg$pred <- predict(est$fit[[1]], data = exp3_data_agg, group_by = c("chunk", "gap"))

exp3_data_agg |>
  ggplot(aes(gap, p_correct, color = chunk, group = chunk)) +
  geom_point() +
  stat_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE) +
  geom_line(aes(y = pred), color = "black") +
  scale_color_discrete("1st chunk LTM?") +
  facet_wrap(~itemtype) +
  theme_pub()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
```
